
```{r}
plot(test, 4, show.bp = T)
```

```{r}
plot(crop(spei_obs[[3]], bbox))
test2 <- eot(spei_coarse, crop(spei_obs, bbox), n = 30)
plot(test2[[5]])
nXplain(test2, .85)
```
```{r}
plot(predict(test2, spei_coarse, 12)[[1:10]] - spei_obs[[1:10]])
```
